summary: Comprehensive testing of DEZX platform - All features working correctly. Backend API tests: 28/28 passed. Frontend UI tests: All critical flows verified.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 features verified working: Admin login, Designer login, Client login, Admin Dashboard with stats, Settings page with feature toggles, Audit Logs page, Notifications page for all roles. Sidebar navigation correct for each role. File uploads are MOCKED to local storage.

admin_dashboard.stats_display: PASS - Shows users, projects, competitions, proposals

sidebar_navigation.admin_sidebar: PASS - Dashboard, Users, Site Content, All Projects, All Competitions, Settings, Audit Logs, Notifications
sidebar_navigation.designer_sidebar: PASS - Dashboard, My Submissions, My Proposals, Profile, Notifications
sidebar_navigation.client_sidebar: PASS - Dashboard, My Projects, My Competitions, Profile, Notifications

mocked_apis.file_uploads: MOCKED - saves to /app/uploads/ instead of Cloudinary
